      public static boolean EmailValidator(String email)
      Function to validate email provided. It checks whether the email provided meets the email valid format.
      Parameters:
      email - The email to validate.
      Returns:
      true if the email is valid, otherwise false.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if the phone number is valid, otherwise false.

      Returns:
      A valid appointment ID or an empty string if the user enters "back".

      public static boolean promptConfirmation(String message)
      Prompts the user for confirmation, typically used for confirming data removal.
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • generateUniqueId

      Generates a unique ID for a HashMap key.
      Type Parameters:

      V - The value type of the HashMap.
      Parameters:
      database - The HashMap to generate the ID for.
      Returns:
      A unique ID for the database.

    • setDate

      public static String setDate(boolean now)
      Sets the date to either the current date or a user-input date.
      Parameters:
      now - true to return the current time, otherwise false to prompt the user for a new time.
      Returns:
      Date in the format "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm".

    • setDateOnly

      public static String setDateOnly()
      Sets the date to either the current date or a user-input date without time.
      Returns:
      Date in the format "yyyy-MM-dd".

    • LocalDateTimediff

      Checks if the time difference between the given date and current time exceeds 1 hour.
      Parameters:
      date - Date in string format.
      Returns:
      true if the time difference exceeds 1 hour, otherwise false.

      toDate - To date in string format.
      Returns:
      true if fromDate is earlier than toDate, otherwise false.
